mdRecord.dcterms:description: The former Van Nelle Factory on the Schie river in Rotterdam, is one of the most important historic industrial buildings in the world. It is an example of Nieuwe Bouwen, modern architecture in the Netherlands. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Van_Nelle_Factory [work]
